Subject: null returned when trying to get CrawlController from SheetManager
 - 2.0.1-snapshot
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=334689939

version: trunk/heritrix2@5733

Here's the code snippet:
---------
EngineConfig config = new EngineConfig();
config.setJobsDirectory("/tmp/hjobs");
		
Engine engine = new EngineImpl(config);
		
String job = "ready-new_proj";
		
engine.copy("profile-me", job);

// Bug - http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER-1457
engine.getSheetManagerStub(job);
SheetManager fsm = engine.getSheetManager(job);
		
CrawlController cc = fsm.findUniqueGlobalModule(CrawlController.class);
		
if(cc == null) {
	System.out.println("Null controller");
}
---------

The CrawlController (cc) is always null, and I don't know why.  I've 
tried launching the job, then getting the cc (which wouldn't work for 
me, but might help diagnosing) and it changes nothing.


Here is the global sheet (which is the only sheet):
